Description: Black steatite shabti with incised detail: a striated lappet-wig, a modelled face, a collar and a pectoral, unjoined relief hands holding hoes with wedjat-eyes beneath, winged female figure across the waist and a seed-basket at the back; leg section inscribed with a version of Chapter 6 of the Book of the Dead in one column and five rows of Hieroglyphic text.
